content: in each of the next 2 sts repeat from * to end join to 1st half_double_crochet 32 3½ r5 chain 1 work 2 half_double_crochet in same st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts * 2 half_double_crochet in next st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts repeat from * to end join to 1st half_double_crochet 40 4½ r6 accent chain 1 work 2 single_crochet in same st 1 single_crochet in each of the next 4 sts * 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in each of the next 4 sts repeat from * to end join to 1st single_crochet 48 5 r7 chain 1 work 2 half_double_crochet in same st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 5 sts * 2 half_double_crochet in next st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 5 sts repeat from * to end 56 6 r8 chain 2 counts as 1st double_crochet 2 double_crochet in same st 1 double_crochet in next st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts * 1 double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next st 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts repeat from * to end join to top of beg chain 2 66 sts - 6 waves r8 for the visual crocheter - so you don t get lost ch2 & 2dc - double_crochet - half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet - single_crochet - 2sc - half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet - single_crochet - single_crochet - single_crochet - half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet - repeat from * - join r9 accent row chain 1 work 1 single_crochet in same st & in each st to end join to 1st single_crochet 66 copyright @ 2010 -
